name: gen3-kro-dev
postCreateCommand:
bash -c 'sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /workspaces/gen3-kro && git config --global --add safe.directory /workspaces/gen3-kro && 
  # Create required output directories
  mkdir -p /workspaces/gen3-kro/outputs/logs && 
  mkdir -p /workspaces/gen3-kro/outputs/argo && 
  echo "Dev container setup complete!" && 
  # Attempt to load kubeconfig and ArgoCD creds if AWS is configured and script exists
  if [[ -f /workspaces/gen3-kro/bootstrap/scripts/connect-cluster.sh ]]; then 
    if command -v aws >/dev/null 2>&1 && [[ -n "${AWS_PROFILE:-}" || -f /home/vscode/.aws/credentials ]]; then 
      echo "Running connect-cluster.sh for staging (will be skipped if prerequisites are missing)..." && 
      bash /workspaces/gen3-kro/bootstrap/scripts/connect-cluster.sh staging || true; 
    else 
      echo "AWS CLI or credentials not found; skipping connect-cluster.sh."; 
    fi 
  fi'
